title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define project scope, objectives, and requirements for the OffshoreWindFarmPlanner software.

title: System Architecture Design
description: Design the overall system architecture, including components, data flow, integration points, and key considerations for maintainability, scalability, performance, security, accessibility (user-friendly interface), and modularity. This task follows completion of Project Planning and Requirements Gathering, Environmental Data Analysis, and Wind Energy Modeling. Focus on creating an extensible system with clean interfaces that facilitates easy integration of future features and consider the use of microservices architecture to enable this. Review and incorporate feedback from cross-functional team members as needed. Prepare a technical design document detailing the proposed architecture and present it to the team for discussion and refinement. This task is currently assigned to the code-architect but may require collaboration with frontend-developer, backend-developer, database-specialist, devops-engineer, qa-tester, security-specialist, and technical-writer.

title: Environmental Data Integration
description: Identify and integrate relevant environmental data sources (e.g., wind patterns, ocean currents, weather conditions) for wind farm planning.

title: Wind Farm Layout Optimization Algorithm
description: Develop an AI-powered algorithm for optimal wind turbine placement and layout based on environmental factors and energy production efficiency.

title: User Interface Design - Refined
description: Design an intuitive and user-friendly interface for wind farm planning and visualization with a focus on efficiency, scalability, and seamless integration with the system architecture. Prioritize accessibility and cross-platform compatibility, ensuring compliance with best practices. Provide clear documentation and consider incorporating interactive tutorials for easy onboarding of new users. Also, emphasize on data visualization that can effectively represent complex wind farm layouts and environmental factors, as well as energy production efficiency. Collaborate with the task-decomposer to ensure alignment with overall project goals.

title: Database Design and Implementation
description: Design and implement a database schema to store environmental data, wind farm layouts, and related information.

title: Security and Access Control
description: Implement security measures and access control mechanisms to protect sensitive data and ensure proper authorization.

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Develop a comprehensive testing strategy and plan for the OffshoreWindFarmPlanner software, including unit tests, integration tests, and user acceptance testing.

title: Deployment and DevOps
description: Set up the deployment pipeline, infrastructure, and monitoring for the OffshoreWindFarmPlanner software.

title: Documentation and User Guides
description: Create comprehensive documentation and user guides for the OffshoreWindFarmPlanner software.
